mapper.update:
update problem_set
title = #{title},
description = #{description},
status = #{status},
update_user = #{updateUser},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select ps.id, ps.title, ps.status, ps.create_time, COUNT(psi.id) + COUNT(ep.id) as problem_count, u.id as create_user_id, u.username as create_user_name from problem_set ps left join user u on ps.create_user = u.id LEFT JOIN problem_set_item psi ON ps.id = psi.problem_set_id LEFT JOIN external_problem ep ON ep.problem_set_id = ps.id
and ps.title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
and ps.status = #{status}
GROUP BY ps.id
